news.title: AI is creating new billionaires at a record pace
news.summary: With time, and IPOs, many of today's private AI fortunes will eventually become more liquid, providing a historic opportunity for wealth management firms.

news.title: AI agents are being drafted into the cyber defense forces of corporations
news.summary: Agentic AI is being deployed as a new line of defense. Cybercriminal organizations use more sophisticated AI for phishing attacks and other hacks.

news.title: What private assets in 401(k) plans mean for investors: 'You’re only asking for trouble,' one advisor says
news.summary: Millions of investors may soon have access to private assets in their 401(k) or other workplace retirement plans. What to know about the risks and rewards.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for steady income
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Chevron and AT&T. TipRanks: Chevron, AT&T and Chevron are three of the best dividend paying stocks.

news.title: We spent $104 million turning an abandoned 19th-century college in NYC into luxury apartments—take a look inside
news.summary: The Hartby in Brooklyn, New York was formerly St. John's College before the school closed in 1972. The Hartby is located on the site of the former campus.

news.title: ‘I’m scared to lose’: I have $140K in a 401(k) and earn $45K a year. Can I retire in 20 years?
news.summary: “My 401(k) retirement planner shows I’ll likely be short $1,500 every month during my retirement.”

news.title: ‘I have a great mortgage rate’: I need $80K to buy my husband out of our home. Do I raid my $180K Roth IRA?
news.summary: “I have two young children. I’m very proud of them,” she said. “I’ve always been proud of my children.”

news.title: ‘This scam stuff is going to get worse’: A man approached me in my car — he had a crazy story
news.summary: “I got rid of him by asking for a business card and a company name, and he bugged out,” she says.

news.title: My late husband’s employer is forcing me to take 10% 401(k) distributions. Help!
news.summary: A company representative said the account needed to be emptied within a 10-year period, he says. “A company rep said the accounts needed to have been emptied within 10 years,” he says, “and they were.”

news.title: ‘Things are getting tougher’: I’m struggling with $145,000 in debt. Should I refinance my 3.5% mortgage?
news.summary: “I’m in my upper 40s and have $300,000 in my 401(k),” he says. “I'm in my mid-40s. I’ve got a 401(K) that’s worth $300k.”
